page.title: 05INTERVIEW Holworthy Farm
page.content: Between May 1st and October 29th the farm offers a Bed and Breakfast service for tourists. They come mainly from Wales but also from all over the world for the summer trout fishing season. When the reservoir was built in 1974 the farm lost land but was given compensation. The farmer and his family were not against it, for as they said "it was better than a motorway!". A tourist industry developed from it and recreation is now available through water sports. The water is not used by the farm for irrigation.
